    • getActiveSkill

      public WeaponAction getActiveSkill​(Actor target, java.lang.String direction)
      Description copied from interface: Weapon
      Get an action or skill from the weapon that will be used against one target. This method allows weapon instance to interact with Actor class. It can be used to have actionable special attack, heal, silence, etc. to a target
      Parameters:
      target - the target actor
      direction - the direction of target, e.g. "north"
      Returns:
      null by default because a weapon doesn't have any active skill. Otherwise, return a WeaponAction instance.
      See Also:
      for a self-direction skill instead of using this method (recommendation)
